title: How do I add an add-on to my license?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I have a Unity Pro license, but I need to build to mobile platforms.
  • I would like to know how I can add an add-on to an existing license.

sections.title: Cause
content: If you have a Pro license, in the past you needed to purchase iOS Pro and/or Android Pro add-ons separately to deploy to mobile platforms.

sections.title: Resolution
content: As of June 28th 2016, our licenses include the iOS and Android add-ons at no extra cost. This means that if you have a Pro or Plus subscription, you can deploy to iOS and Android without an add-on.
Personal Edition users also have iOS and Android deployment included for free.

sections.title: More Information
content: You can see the full licensing options at our Store page.
For more information on migration, please see this article.
